snippet: The real Serena Williams finally turned up at the French Open on Saturday in pursuit of a 22nd grand slam singles title but it was to no avail as she lost to a tenacious opponent who beat her at her own power game....
lead_paragraph: The real Serena Williams finally turned up at the French Open on Saturday in pursuit of a 22nd grand slam singles title but it was to no avail as she lost to a tenacious opponent who beat her at her own power game.

headline.print_headline: The Real Serena Finally Shows Up but It's All in Vain
headline.main: The Real Serena Finally Shows Up but It's All in Vain
